description: Commands to manage cloud links in a private cloud.

commands.name: az vmware cloud-link create
commands.summary: Create a cloud link in a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware cloud-link create --cloud-link-name
                            --private-cloud
                            --resource-group
                            [--linked-cloud]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az vmware cloud-link create --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --name cloudLink1 --linked-cloud "/subscriptions/12341234-1234-1234-1234-123412341234/resourceGroups/mygroup/providers/Microsoft.AVS/privateClouds/cloud2

commands.name: az vmware cloud-link delete
commands.summary: Delete a cloud link in a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware cloud-link delete [--cloud-link-name]
                            [--ids]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--private-cloud]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--subscription]
                            [--yes]
examples: az vmware cloud-link delete --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --name cloudLink1

commands.name: az vmware cloud-link list
commands.summary: List cloud link in a private cloud.
examples: az vmware cloud-link list --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1

commands.name: az vmware cloud-link show
commands.summary: Show details of a cloud link in a private cloud.
examples: az vmware cloud-link show --resource-group group1 --private-cloud cloud1 --name cloudLink1

commands.name: az vmware cloud-link update
commands.summary: Update a cloud link in a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware cloud-link update [--add]
                            [--cloud-link-name]
                            [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--ids]
                            [--linked-cloud]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--private-cloud]
                            [--remove]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--set]
                            [--subscription]

commands.name: az vmware cloud-link wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
